narrative.title: 101 Divisione Motorizzata Trieste - 1942Q4

operations.name: Second Battle of El Alamein (Reserve)
operations.role: Division held in reserve in northern sector of Axis line
operations.outcome: Ordered forward on 26 October to enter front line

operations.name: Second Battle of El Alamein (Defensive)
operations.role: Defensive operations in northern El Alamein sector
operations.outcome: Disaster - British breakthrough 2 November created 4-5km gap in 65th Regiment. Division mostly annihilated by 4 November.

operations.name: Retreat to El Agheila
operations.outcome: 26 November: Division remnants reorganized at El Agheila with survivors from other destroyed divisions

situation.combat_effectiveness: Good initially, catastrophic by end of quarter. Division was one of better Italian motorized formations in North Africa. However, overwhelming British superiority in numbers, armor, artillery, and especially logistics led to division's destruction at El Alamein. By 4 November 1942, division effectively ceased to exist as a fighting formation.
notable_engagements: El Alamein defensive battle (26 Oct - 4 Nov 1942)

narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.
